changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.attribute_meta_attribute AS SELECT aa.id, ba.name AS base_attribute, a.name AS attribute, aa.integer_value, aa.numeric_value, aa.boolean_value, aa.text_value, av.name AS attribute_value, u.name AS unit, aa.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, aa.update_date FROM ruleform.attribute_meta_attribute aa JOIN ruleform.attribute ba ON ba.id = aa.attribute JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON aa.meta_attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.attribute av ON aa.attribute_value = av.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.unit u ON aa.unit_value = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON aa.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON aa.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.attribute_meta_attribute OWNER TO core;
